Schenectady.Mohawk Commons (Niskayuna, New York):
Mohawk Commons is a lifestyle center in Niskayuna, New York. It opened in 2002 and replaced the older enclosed Mohawk Mall previously located on the property.


== Anchor stores ==
Bed Bath & Beyond
Marshalls
Target


== Ownership ==
The property, including the largely empty Mohawk Mall, was purchased from Wilmorite Properties in June 2000, by Myron M. Hunt and Benderson Development Co.
